皇天不負苦心人.definition: Heaven will not disappoint the person who tries (idiom). If you try hard, you're bound to succeed eventually.

皇太極.definition: Hong Taiji (1592-1643), eighth son of Nurhaci 努爾哈赤|努尔哈赤[Nu3 er3 ha1 chi4], reigned 1626-1636 as Second Khan of Later Jin dynasty 後金|后金[Hou4 Jin1], then founded the Qing dynasty 大清[Da4 Qing1] and reigned 1636-1643 as Emperor; posthumous name 清太宗[Qing1 Tai4 zong1]

皇太極清太宗.pinyin: Huang2 tai4 ji2 Qing1 Tai4 zong1

皇恩.definition: imperial kindness; benevolence from the emperor

皇曆.definition: variant of 黃曆|黄历[huang2 li5]

皇朝.definition: the imperial court; the government in imperial times

皇榜.definition: imperial notice (announcement in the form of a notice posted with the authority of the emperor)

皇法.definition: imperial law; same as 王法[wang2 fa3]

皇甫嵩.definition: Huangfu Song (-195), later Han general and warlord

皇甫鎛.definition: Huangfu Bo (c. 800), Minister during early Tang

皇皇.definition: magnificent; variant of 惶惶[huang2 huang2]; variant of 遑遑[huang2 huang2]

皇糧.definition: lit. imperial funding for troops; funds or items supplied by the government
